original_title: Á skjön – verk og dagar Magnúsar Pálssonar
overview: After a career more influential than most in Icelandic contemporary art, at 87, Magnús Pálsson stages his most substantial performances and undertakes a voyage both through his own catalogue and Icelandic autumn landscapes to his cottage, Askew, in Dalir county.
title: Askew – Works and Days of Magnús Pálsson
